titleStmt.title: The soules vocation or effectual calling to Christ. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland, for Andrew Crooke, and are to be sold at the Black Beare in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page on E1, "The soules effectuall calling to Christ", dated 1637. "Sub tp largely in the same setting as [STC] 13733, w. which it was app. orig. intended to be issued because 13733 fills the gap in collation and pagination before the sub tp."--STC.
Running title reads: The soules effectuall calling to Christ.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
